```{r}
shinyApp(
  ui = fluidPage(
  theme = bs_theme(version = 4, bootswatch = "minty"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      ChooseCountryListUI("1")),
    mainPanel(
      tabsetPanel(type = "tabs",
                  tabPanel("Custom", textOutput("ChooseCountryList")),
                  tabPanel("Overview"),
                  tabPanel("XvsY"))
        ),
  )
),
  
##########################################################################
  server = function(input, output) {
    output$ChooseCountryList<-ChooseCountryListServer("1")
  }
)
```
